featured.text: From Binet’s work, the phrase “intelligence quotient” (“IQ”) entered the English vocabulary.

other.text: MOOCs first made waves in the fall of 2011, when Professor Sebastian Thrun from Stanford University opened his graduate-level artificial intelligence course up to any student anywhere, and 160,000 students in more than 190 countries signed up.

definition.zh_def: 智力；理解、學習和適應環境的能力。
definition.en_def: The ability to acquire and apply knowledge and skills.
definition.example: Her intelligence helped her solve complex problems quickly.
